name: Su Khing Than
subDescription: Flutter | Android – Java/Kotlin | Php | Node.js | MongoDB
aboutDescription: Senior Mobile Developer with 8+ years of experience specializing in Flutter, Android (Java/Kotlin), backend APIs, and scalable architectures. Strong background in leading mobile teams, delivering full-stack solutions, and optimizing app performance. Skilled in modern state-management (Riverpod, Provider, GetX), Firebase, CI/CD pipelines, and backend development with Node.js and MongoDB.

experiences.description: Enhanced warehouse workflows including internal transfer search, barcode scanning, and UOM consistency across modules. Improved accuracy, reduced manual workloads, and optimized real-time warehouse communication.

Led mobile team operations, sprint planning, and development cycles. Delivered Social E-commerce features with high performance and reliability. Established CI/CD pipelines and scalable Flutter architecture. Mentored junior developers and improved team productivity.

Led development of high-traffic consumer apps using Riverpod-based architecture. Integrated Maps, multilingual features, deep linking, and secure payment flows. Improved app reliability with analytics, crash reporting, and runtime monitoring.
Developed Athabyar, Chit May May, and Edu Click apps using GetX with MVC architecture. Integrated ads, analytics, and crash reporting. Deployed apps to Play Store and App Store.
Built large-scale Android apps with order tracking, invoice management, and notifications. Developed AR modules and advanced GPS-based features.
Developed telecom apps including Shop Myar, Lucky Draw, and ATOM/Telenor systems. Implemented OTP/SMS verification, deep linking, and subscription services.
Built ERP registration system using Yii Framework. Coordinated with government officials and performed QA and system verification.

projects.name: Portfolio
projects.description: This open source project allows anyone to have an online portfolio in less than 10 minutes. It follows a riverpod-based architecture, using a feature-first approach for its structure. It is fully responsive and supports multiple themes as well as multiple languages.

projects.name: Little Tots Cards
projects.description: Little Tots Card App is an interactive learning application designed for young children. It displays colorful fruit flash cards with matching sounds to help kids learn.

skills: Flutter / Dart, Android (Java/Kotlin), Php, Yii2 Framework, Laravel, Riverpod, GetX, Provider, Bloc, Node.js, MongoDB
education:
